title: 迁移服务器后部分插件报错问题
author: zedwm
txt_content:
迁移了服务器后后台开始出现这样的BUG
[07:20:04 ERROR]: Couldn't save chunk; already in use by another instance of Minecraft?
net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ExceptionWorldConflict: The save is being accessed from another location, aborting
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.WorldNBTStorage.checkSession(WorldNBTStorage.java:78) ~[server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.World.checkSession(World.java:2685) ~[server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.saveChunk(ChunkRegionLoader.java:120) ~[server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ChunkProviderServer.saveChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:207) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ChunkProviderServer.unloadChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:299) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ChunkProviderServer.unloadChunks(ChunkProviderServer.java:257) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.WorldServer.doTick(WorldServer.java:294) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:742) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:371) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:651) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:555) [server.jar:git-Bukkit-e60fc34]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:834) [?:?]复制代码全部日志如下
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1283YDUdgxxwLw3yxJyINtg 
提取码：wic0

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
无法保存区块
你是不是从高版本降到低版本了？
如果是这样的话，最好去做存档转换，否则只能删掉重新生成
